description: Returns metadata associated with a recovery point, including ID, status, encryption, and lifecycle.

parameters.name: BackupVaultName
parameters.description: The name of a logical container where backups are stored. Backup vaults are identified by names that are unique to the account used to create them and the Amazon Web Services Region where they are created.

parameters.name: RecoveryPointArn
parameters.description: An Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies a recovery point; for example, arn:aws:backup:us-east-1:123456789012:recovery-point:1EB3B5E7-9EB0-435A-A80B-108B488B0D45.

nested_items.name: RecoveryPointArn
nested_items.description: An ARN that uniquely identifies a recovery point; for example, arn:aws:backup:us-east-1:123456789012:recovery-point:1EB3B5E7-9EB0-435A-A80B-108B488B0D45.

nested_items.name: BackupVaultName
nested_items.description: The name of a logical container where backups are stored. Backup vaults are identified by names that are unique to the account used to create them and the Region where they are created.

nested_items.name: BackupVaultArn
nested_items.description: An ARN that uniquely identifies a backup vault; for example, arn:aws:backup:us-east-1:123456789012:backup-vault:aBackupVault.

nested_items.name: SourceBackupVaultArn
nested_items.description: An Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies the source vault where the resource was originally backed up in; for example, arn:aws:backup:us-east-1:123456789012:backup-vault:aBackupVault. If the recovery is restored to the same Amazon Web Services account or Region, this value will be null.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: An ARN that uniquely identifies a saved resource. The format of the ARN depends on the resource type.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: The type of Amazon Web Services resource to save as a recovery point; for example, an Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon EBS) volume or an Amazon Relational Database Service (Amazon RDS) database.

nested_items.name: CreatedBy
nested_items.description: Contains identifying information about the creation of a recovery point, including the BackupPlanArn, BackupPlanId, BackupPlanVersion, and BackupRuleId of the backup plan used to create it.

nested_items.name: BackupPlanId
nested_items.description: Uniquely identifies a backup plan.

nested_items.name: BackupPlanArn
nested_items.description: An Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies a backup plan; for example, arn:aws:backup:us-east-1:123456789012:plan:8F81F553-3A74-4A3F-B93D-B3360DC80C50.

nested_items.name: BackupPlanVersion
nested_items.description: Version IDs are unique, randomly generated, Unicode, UTF-8 encoded strings that are at most 1,024 bytes long. They cannot be edited.

nested_items.name: BackupRuleId
nested_items.description: Uniquely identifies a rule used to schedule the backup of a selection of resources.

nested_items.name: IamRoleArn
nested_items.description: Specifies the IAM role ARN used to create the target recovery point; for example, arn:aws:iam::123456789012:role/S3Access.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: A status code specifying the state of the recovery point.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: A status message explaining the status of the recovery point.

nested_items.name: CreationDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that a recovery point is created, in Unix format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The value of CreationDate is accurate to milliseconds. For example, the value 1516925490.087 represents Friday, January 26, 2018 12:11:30.087 AM.

nested_items.name: CompletionDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that a job to create a recovery point is completed, in Unix format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The value of CompletionDate is accurate to milliseconds. For example, the value 1516925490.087 represents Friday, January 26, 2018 12:11:30.087 AM.

nested_items.name: BackupSizeInBytes
nested_items.description: The size, in bytes, of a backup.

nested_items.name: CalculatedLifecycle
nested_items.description: A CalculatedLifecycle object containing DeleteAt and MoveToColdStorageAt timestamps.

nested_items.name: MoveToColdStorageAt
nested_items.description: A timestamp that specifies when to transition a recovery point to cold storage.

nested_items.name: DeleteAt
nested_items.description: A timestamp that specifies when to delete a recovery point.

nested_items.name: Lifecycle
nested_items.description: The lifecycle defines when a protected resource is transitioned to cold storage and when it expires. Backup transitions and expires backups automatically according to the lifecycle that you define.

nested_items.name: MoveToColdStorageAfterDays
nested_items.description: The number of days after creation that a recovery point is moved to cold storage.

nested_items.name: DeleteAfterDays
nested_items.description: The number of days after creation that a recovery point is deleted. This value must be at least 90 days after the number of days specified in MoveToColdStorageAfterDays.

nested_items.name: OptInToArchiveForSupportedResources
nested_items.description: If the value is true, your backup plan transitions supported resources to archive (cold) storage tier in accordance with your lifecycle settings.

nested_items.name: EncryptionKeyArn
nested_items.description: The server-side encryption key used to protect your backups; for example, arn:aws:kms:us-west-2:111122223333:key/1234abcd-12ab-34cd-56ef-1234567890ab.

nested_items.name: IsEncrypted
nested_items.description: A Boolean value that is returned as TRUE if the specified recovery point is encrypted, or FALSE if the recovery point is not encrypted.

nested_items.name: StorageClass
nested_items.description: Specifies the storage class of the recovery point. Valid values are WARM or COLD.

nested_items.name: LastRestoreTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that a recovery point was last restored, in Unix format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The value of LastRestoreTime is accurate to milliseconds. For example, the value 1516925490.087 represents Friday, January 26, 2018 12:11:30.087 AM.

nested_items.name: ParentRecoveryPointArn
nested_items.description: This is an ARN that uniquely identifies a parent (composite) recovery point; for example, arn:aws:backup:us-east-1:123456789012:recovery-point:1EB3B5E7-9EB0-435A-A80B-108B488B0D45.

nested_items.name: CompositeMemberIdentifier
nested_items.description: The identifier of a resource within a composite group, such as nested (child) recovery point belonging to a composite (parent) stack. The ID is transferred from the logical ID within a stack.

nested_items.name: IsParent
nested_items.description: This returns the boolean value that a recovery point is a parent (composite) job.

nested_items.name: ResourceName
nested_items.description: The name of the resource that belongs to the specified backup.

nested_items.name: VaultType
nested_items.description: The type of vault in which the described recovery point is stored.

nested_items.name: IndexStatus
nested_items.description: This is the current status for the backup index associated with the specified recovery point.

nested_items.name: IndexStatusMessage
nested_items.description: A string in the form of a detailed message explaining the status of a backup index associated with the recovery point.
